00001 #include "misrproj.h"          /* Prototype for this function */
00002 #include "errormacros.h"       /* Error macros */
00003 
00004 extern int nb;
00005 extern int nl;
00006 extern int ns;
00007 extern float absOffset[NBLOCK];
00008 extern double ulc[2];
00009 extern double lrc[2];
00010 extern double sx;
00011 extern double sy;
00012 extern double xc;
00013 extern double yc;
00014 
00015 #define FUNC_NAMEm "misrinv"
00016 
00017 int misrinv(
00018 const int      block,      /* Input block */
00019 const float    line,       /* Input line */
00020 const float    sample,     /* Input sample */
00021 double*        x,          /* Output SOM X coordinate */
00022 double*        y           /* Output SOM Y coordinate */
00023 )
00024 {
00025   int          n;          /* Number of line to current block */
00026   char         msg[STRLEN];    /* Warning message */
00027 
00028 /* Check Arguments */
00029 
00030   if (block < 1 || block > NBLOCK) {
00031     sprintf(msg, "block is out of range (0 < %d < %d)", block, nb);
00032     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00033   }
00034 
00035   if (line < -0.5 || line > nl - 0.5) {
00036     sprintf(msg, "line is out of range (0 < %e < %d)", line, nl);
00037     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00038   }
00039 
00040   if (sample < -0.5 || sample > ns - 0.5) {
00041     sprintf(msg, "sample is out of range (0 < %e < %d)", sample, ns);
00042     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00043   }
00044 
00045 /* Compute SOM x/y coordinates in ulc/lrc units (meters) */
00046 
00047   n = (int)((block - 1) * nl * sx);
00048   *x = (double)(xc + n + (line * sx));
00049   *y = (double)(yc + ((sample + absOffset[block-1]) * sy));
00050 
00051   return(0);
00052 
00053  ERROR_HANDLE:
00054 
00055   *x = -1e-9;
00056   *y = -1e-9;
00057   return(1);
00058 }
